name: Chess 2 (itch) (Maahi)
description:
Game Rules - 

Before the game starts player has to prep pieces according to there choice, both the sides will do this until all the pieces are placed, after placing them game will start.

Pieces features 
  • King :  Can move to one block in any direction.  
  • Bomber : Moves like a King,  but takes the piece that  takes it.
  • Wizard : Can move like a Queen  but it moves all the way it can go in the  direction it chooses.
  • Knight :  Can go 2 block  straight and can even  turn.  
  • Rook :  Can move horizontally or  vertically, through  any number of  unoccupied squares.
  • Pawn : Pawn can move vertically 1 blocks and can kill vertically only.
